LanguageData.Forbidden_Studies.label: Decipher strange symbols
LanguageData.Forbidden_Studies.description: Deciphers some of the materials language to make further research possible.
LanguageData.Forbidden_Deities.label: Probe occult deities
LanguageData.Forbidden_Deities.description: Repeatable research to discover occult deities to worship.
LanguageData.Forbidden_Lore.label: Study successful cults
LanguageData.Forbidden_Lore.description: Repeatable research to improve the researcher's cult mindedness and social skills during the research process.\n\nThis research is recommended for pawns looking to become preachers.
LanguageData.Forbidden_Attire.label: Ritual Attire
LanguageData.Forbidden_Attire.description: Allows for the design and creation of occult robes, hoods, and various masks. Wearing proper clothing increases chances of successful sacrifices.
LanguageData.Forbidden_Sculptures.label: Sculptures
LanguageData.Forbidden_Sculptures.description: Allows for the design and creation of occult sculptures dedicated to otherworldly entities.
LanguageData.Forbidden_Obelisks.label: Obelisk Construction
LanguageData.Forbidden_Obelisks.description: Allows for the design and construction of occult obelisks.
LanguageData.Forbidden_Altar.label: Altar
LanguageData.Forbidden_Altar.description: Allows the creation of an altar of worship to conduct rituals for beings beyond this world.
LanguageData.Forbidden_Sacrifice.label: Altar of Sacrifice
LanguageData.Forbidden_Sacrifice.description: Allows you to upgrade an altar to an altar of sacrifice to show greater appreciation of extradimensional beings.
LanguageData.Forbidden_Reports.label: Chronicling
LanguageData.Forbidden_Reports.description: Adds a Reports button to the altar that shows the most recent sacrifice's results in detail.
LanguageData.Forbidden_Human.label: Human Sacrifice
LanguageData.Forbidden_Human.description: Allows you to upgrade an altar to an altar of human sacrifice, allowing for impressive benefits from cosmic entities.
